item.title: Learnings from projects & things I've made so far.
item.description: This is a general blog post on my various schemes so far, loosely grouped around topic. I look like this when I’ve made something: Sustainability electrade app | The world’s first EV marketplace Tech: * React-Native App * Backend Node/Express/Postgres, storing listing photos to S3 * Dynamic pricing data from other sites & EV News scraped with APIfy.com * Mapping data from OpenChargeMap.com Stats: * MRR: $0 * Monthly Listings: 0 * Users: 10 App Store Link Electrification.
